ability.Regenerative Fury: When Hydragar's HP drops below 50%, it regenerates 20% of its maximum HP at the end of each turn.
ability.Nine-Headed Vengeance: When hit by a critical hit, Hydragar's Attack and Special Attack increase by 2 stages.

Flame Torrent.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Venomous Spit.effect: Has a 50% chance to poison the target.

Aqua Slash.effect: Each time Hydraga uses Aqua Slash, increases chances of its critical hit rate by 20%.

Hydra Wrath.effect: Reduces the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
